tool_description: Evaluates how environmental factors affect skin condition and identifies environmental stressors impacting skin health.

climate_type.description: Current climate: humid, dry, temperate, tropical, cold

sun_exposure_hours.description: Average daily sun exposure in hours (0-12)

water_hardness.description: Local water quality: soft, moderate, hard, very_hard

work_environment.description: Primary work setting: office, outdoor, industrial, healthcare, home

seasonal_changes.description: Whether skin changes significantly with seasons

error_messages: Invalid climate type: Must be one of [humid, dry, temperate, tropical, cold].
Invalid pollution level: pollution_exposure must be integer between 1-5.
Invalid sun exposure: sun_exposure_hours must be number between 0-12.
Invalid water hardness: Must be one of [soft, moderate, hard, very_hard].
Invalid work environment: Must be one of [office, outdoor, industrial, healthcare, home].
Environmental inconsistency: High pollution exposure should correlate with urban work environments.
usage: Assess your typical daily environment including climate, pollution levels, indoor conditions, and occupational exposures. Consider both direct and indirect environmental impacts on skin.
